channel.title: [317] Quest cape emote [317]
channel.description:
Hey I am wondering if any of you know a common emote # for the quest cape emote? I am making my server so when you get cb 126 you do the quest emote.
My source is Lost Legacy (PI)

item.title: [317] Quest cape emote [317]
item.dc:creator: @triger545 triger545
item.description:
@triger545 wrote:

Wintercanon:

Runescape revision 317 didn’t have quest capes. If you want to use animations, models and graphics from a later revision I suggest you write a gameserver to handle that client.

Lost Legacy comes with the client and server to run a quest emote already. I just can’t remember what the emote # it was.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Quest cape emote [317]
item.dc:creator: @xalexo xalexo
item.description:
@xalexo wrote:

lost legacy i THINK has a ::qpsk command

just add a method into the command which only lets 126’s do it

Read full topic
